about_the_game:
This Package has additional software -> DirectX Runtime, Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime and EOS (Epic Online Services Bootstrapper) and Easy Anti-Cheat Bootstrapper. These will be automaticly installed when you launch the application for the First Time.

This is a Endless Runner game which is an addictive game for ages 3+ but their is alot of new features which we have now built into the game which we think you might love (As a customer):

*All new Epic Online Services Social Overlay which allows you to invite your freinds to your game.
*However we are currently working on making updates in game instead of Downloading a whole new version from any store.
*We are currently offering this game via the Google Play Store which is designed for Android phones which are based on Android 9 Pie - Android 12.

Any Feedback just use the Support Contact Info, Your Subject Must be "Feedback on Endless Runner".
detailed_description:
This Package has additional software -> DirectX Runtime, Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime and EOS (Epic Online Services Bootstrapper) and Easy Anti-Cheat Bootstrapper. These will be automaticly installed when you launch the application for the First Time.

This is a Endless Runner game which is an addictive game for ages 3+ but their is alot of new features which we have now built into the game which we think you might love (As a customer):

*All new Epic Online Services Social Overlay which allows you to invite your freinds to your game.
*However we are currently working on making updates in game instead of Downloading a whole new version from any store.
*We are currently offering this game via the Google Play Store which is designed for Android phones which are based on Android 9 Pie - Android 12.

Any Feedback just use the Support Contact Info, Your Subject Must be "Feedback on Endless Runner".

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.5GHz or AMD Equivlant
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 371 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Intergrated Keyboard and Mouse
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel i9 5.5GHz or AMD Equivlant
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 371 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Intergrated Keyboard and Mouse
